data.name: EXOCIDE
data.detailed_description:
is a retro FPS with an early 00's aesthetic. Manage two powerful sets of weapon systems with extreme aggression to annihilate the swarm! Keep your maniacal robotic backpack excited using a powerful array of weaponry.

- Mix and match ammunition types and weapons for bonuses and rewards.

- Manage your power reserves to find a balance between quick mobility and absurd firepower.

- Go in for the kill with fast paced gory melee combat.


Years ago, several nations deployed giant combat-modified insects to aid in The Great War. This swarm of insects eventually turned in search of a food source to sustain their growing population. A decade of human genocide has wiped out most of the population. The remaining survivors have consolidated into a single fortified colony to fight extinction.


You are the last living member of the Handlers, a highly trained special forces group that was originally tasked with raising and fighting alongside these giant insects during The Great War.

data.short_description: is a retro FPS with an early 00's aesthetic. Manage two powerful weapon systems with extreme aggression to annihilate the swarm! Keep your maniacal robotic backpack excited using a powerful array of weaponry.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 and up
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.7 GHZ Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Equal or Greater than GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Yes

content_descriptors.notes: Bug guts, excessive shooting and mild blood
